attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wish to protest against Wirral Borough Councils plans to close libraries,leisure centres and pacific road theatre

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/WirralCulture/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
